posts.post_title: FS: 4 Cards 1800's Baseball Comics Individual Prices Or All 4 For $old
posts.post_content:
Really cool 4 card lot! The price is $old delivered PP/FF or individually priced below. Thank you.

Centre Field $old
Lawsons $old
Score Card $old
Short Stop $old
Umpires $old
Joe K.
